Class DatabaseRegisterClass

java.lang.Object
ticktocktrack.database.DatabaseRegisterClass
public class DatabaseRegisterClass extends Object
Provides database operations related to class registration, including adding classes, checking existence, enrollment, and fetching students.

      public DatabaseRegisterClass()

  • Method Details

    • addClass

      public static boolean addClass(int teacherId, String courseName, String section, String program)
      Adds a new class to the database.
      Parameters:
      teacherId - The ID of the teacher.
      courseName - The name of the course.
      section - The section of the class.
      program - The program under which the class is offered.
      Returns:
      true if the class was successfully added, false otherwise.

    • getClassId

      public static int getClassId(String courseName, int teacherId, String section, String program)
      Retrieves the class ID based on course details.
      Parameters:
      courseName - The name of the course.
      teacherId - The ID of the teacher.
      section - The section of the class.
      program - The program of the class.
      Returns:
      The class ID if found, or -1 if not found.

    • classExists

      public static boolean classExists(int teacherId, String courseName, String section, String program)
      Checks if a class already exists for a given teacher with specified details, and that it was created by the current admin user.
      Parameters:
      teacherId - The teacher's ID.
      courseName - The course name.
      section - The class section.
      program - The program.
      Returns:
      true if the class exists, false otherwise.

    • getEnrolledStudentIds

      public static Set<Integer> getEnrolledStudentIds(int classId)
      Retrieves the set of student IDs enrolled in a particular class.
      Parameters:
      classId - The ID of the class.
      Returns:
      A set of student IDs enrolled in the class.

    • enrollStudentInClass

      public static boolean enrollStudentInClass(int studentId, int classId)
      Enrolls a student in a specified class.
      Parameters:
      studentId - The ID of the student.
      classId - The ID of the class.
      Returns:
      true if enrollment was successful, false otherwise.

    • getUnenrolledStudents

      public static List<Student> getUnenrolledStudents(int classId)
      Retrieves a list of students who are NOT enrolled in the specified class.
      Parameters:
      classId - The ID of the class.
      Returns:
      A list of Student objects representing unenrolled students.
